document.full_text: two nuclear reactors shut for maintenance in southern japan will not be allowed to restart until tokyo officials answer questions on safety policy, saga prefecture's governor yasushi furukawa said on monday.
document.title: no restart for south japan reactors until safety assured
lines_and_colors: two nuclear reactors shut for maintenance in southern japan will not be allowed to restart until tokyo officials answer questions on safety policy, saga prefecture's governor yasushi furukawa said on monday.
